name: Space Company Simulator
detailed_description:
Face the challenges of conquering space. Lead your company in the race for financial and technological dominance. Launch rockets, satellites, spaceships and orbital stations. Become the new major player in the space industry.

Space Company Simulator is the only simulator of its kind on the market. Inspired by games like Civilization IV and GameDev Tycoon, the gameplay genuinely reflects the challenges of space exploration in a way that no other computer game has done before.

  • Hire a world-class team or train your loyal workers into aerospace geniuses.

  • Research new technologies and improve the existing ones.

  • Take on new contracts. Launch different countries and corporations into space and get rewarded with funds to develop your company further.

  • Face other fast-developing corporations. Show that you’re more effective by winning the financial and technological battle.

  • Learn space exploration at your own pace. Feeling overwhelmed by the game systems? Our robust difficulty system offers you a variety of helpers and to quickly get you off the ground and into space.

  • Enjoy best-in-class visuals. Space company management never looked that good.

  • Created by space geeks, for space geeks. Our team put in hundreds of hours of painstaking research to include every aspect of space exploration.

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
